title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K 9/30/33; lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7492 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for side board. Rounded front of sideboard and squared back edges; low, straight and squared legs, tapered. Two large cabinets at left and right side with circular pulls; three stacked, horizontal drawers at center with long rectangular pulls. Legs, top of sideboard, and pulls in dark material; body in lighter wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-913.
